abstracts.cdata!:
This Environmental Assessment (EA) is a
            collection of three power sector reports that were prepared
            for the Kenya Power Company (KPC).  The reports present the
            results of: (a) an EA study for the development of a 64 MWe
            geothermal power station; (b) an EA study for the
            construction of a 75 MW generating plant at Kepevu; and (c)
            an EA study for the construction of a hydroelectric facility.
